abstract.t: This document describes a declarative (also called intent based) policy model to describe the user's intent on network policy. The intent policy model is a specific data model specifies the desired state of the network system. It helps the service management in Simplified Use of Policy Abstractions (SUPA) to model the policy (a set of states described by constraints) that defines the final results of a VPN service without specifying how it is monitored and managed during its lifecycle. One application for Distributed Data Center (DDC) scenarios with policy enforcement is provided with details of how to convert high level intent policy into lower level configurations.
